channel.title: Scripting News
channel.description: It's even worse than it appears..

item.description: OH on Twitter: I was just about to insult you but Twitter suggested I temper my reply.

source:outline.text: OH on Twitter: I was just about to insult you but Twitter suggested I temper my reply.

item.description: When Kevin Durant said the Knicks weren't cool, the Knicks immediately became the coolest team in the NBA. As a Knicks fan who couldn't care less if KD thinks they're cool, I just love how it turned out.

source:outline.text: When Kevin Durant said the Knicks weren't cool, the Knicks immediately became the coolest team in the NBA. As a Knicks fan who couldn't care less if KD thinks they're cool, I just love how it turned out.

item.description: The beginning of the month ritual is done. I can't believe it's already September, on the other hand, it's freaking me out how cold it is this morning. I might have to put on a sweatshirt. It feels like summer just started. Maybe I need to move to Florida or Palm Springs. Oy. I love the mountains, but I dread the winter. Maybe it won't be so bad this year.

Maybe it won't be so bad this year.
